title: Dhaba Beas - Tynska
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Buffet, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, European
description: Well-known chain of Indian vegetarian dhaba buffets (self service) with a casual, modern atmosphere. Offers both Indian and European vegetarian food including salads and freshly made juices. Food is priced by weight. Happy hour discount 50% off one hour before closing time. Directions: 1 minute walk from Old Square, take Tynska street, just to the left facing side of Tyn Church, the alley winds and forks into different sections, so ask someone. The restaurant is next to Tyn Hostel.
